title: Some Birds Go
description: In Some Birds Go, students will read about different types of birds and when and why they migrate. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and supporting details as well as to connect to prior knowledge. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support emergent readers.
reviewWords: birds, flock, migrate, returns, survive, winter
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word this
